root.name: Atlantis Sky Patrol
root.description: GameplayIn this game you have to save Atlantis from invaders by popping their ships from the sky. The game is a traditional popping game like the popular Luxor games.The game features more than 100 levels, upgrades and a 2 player mode.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 600 MhzMemory: 128 MBGraphics: On-board graphicsDirectXÂ®: 6.0 or higherHard Drive: 51 MBMac System RequirementsOS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.CPU Speed: 1.83 GHzMemory: 512 MB RAM
